roleset.name: to gloat or boast
roleset.note: CROW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'crow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from crow.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Ford officials , for example , crowed about their first-ever Tokyo Grand Prix racing victory .
example.arg: about their first-ever Tokyo Grand Prix racing victory
